law.catch_line: Except as provided in § 7-406(c) of this subtitle, the provisions of this subtitle do not apply to ...
law.text:
Except as provided in § 7-406(c) of this subtitle, the provisions of this subtitle do not apply to any building constructed within the boundaries of a political subdivision if:
the political subdivision has adopted the Energy Code; and
the Energy Code adopted by the political subdivision applies to the building being constructed.
